[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["May 22, 2024 by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/rickhanlonii","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ricky Hanlon"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","hr",null,{}],"
",["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":"Last week we hosted React Conf 2024, a two-day conference in Henderson, Nevada where 700+ attendees gathered in-person to discuss the latest in UI engineering. This was our first in-person conference since 2019, and we were thrilled to be able to bring the community together again."}]}],"
",["$r","hr",null,{}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["At React Conf 2024, we announced the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/blog/2024/12/05/react-19","children":"React 19 RC"}],", the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/reactwg/react-native-new-architecture/discussions/189","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Native New Architecture Beta"}],", and an experimental release of the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/react-compiler","children":"React Compiler"}],". The community also took the stage to announce ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://remix.run/blog/merging-remix-and-react-router","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Router v7"}],", ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=20765s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Universal Server Components"}]," in Expo Router, React Server Components in ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://redwoodjs.com/blog/rsc-now-in-redwoodjs","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"RedwoodJS"}],", and much more."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["The entire ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"day 1"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"day 2"}]," streams are available online. In this post, we’ll summarize the talks and announcements from the event."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"day-1","children":"Day 1 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","em",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=973s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Watch the full day 1 stream here."}]}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["To kick off day 1, Meta CTO ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.threads.net/@boztank","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Andrew “Boz” Bosworth"}]," shared a welcome message followed by an introduction by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/sethwebster","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Seth Webster"}],", who manages the React Org at Meta, and our MC ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/_darkfadr","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ashley Narcisse"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["In the day 1 keynote, ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/en_JS","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Joe Savona"}]," shared our goals and vision for React to make it easy for anyone to build great user experiences. ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/potetotes","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Lauren Tan"}]," followed with a State of React, where she shared that React was downloaded over 1 billion times in 2023, and that 37% of new developers learn to program with React. Finally, she highlighted the work of the React community to make React, React."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"For more, check out these talks from the community later in the conference:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=5542s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Vanilla React"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/ryanflorence","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ryan Florence"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=12728s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Rhythm & Blues"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/leeerob","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Lee Robinson"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=26815s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"RedwoodJS, now with React Server Components"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/selfteachme","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Amy Dutton"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=20765s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Introducing Universal React Server Components in Expo Router"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/Baconbrix","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Evan Bacon"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Next in the keynote, ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/joshcstory","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Josh Story"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/acdlite","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Andrew Clark"}]," shared new features coming in React 19, and announced the React 19 RC which is ready for testing in production. Check out all the features in the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/blog/2024/12/05/react-19","children":"React 19 release post"}],", and see these talks for deep dives on the new features:"]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=8880s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"What’s new in React 19"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/lydiahallie","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Lydia Hallie"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=10112s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Unpacked: A Roadmap to React 19"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/samselikoff","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Sam Selikoff"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=24916s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React 19 Deep Dive: Coordinating HTML"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/joshcstory","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Josh Story"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=25280s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Enhancing Forms with React Server Components"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/aurorascharff","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Aurora Walberg Scharff"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=18825s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React for Two Computers"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/dan_abramov2","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Dan Abramov"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=11256s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"And Now You Understand React Server Components"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/kentcdodds","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Kent C. Dodds"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Finally, we ended the keynote with ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/en_JS","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Joe Savona"}],", ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/_gsathya","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Sathya Gunasekaran"}],", and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/zmofei","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Mofei Zhang"}]," announcing that the React Compiler is now ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/29061","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Open Source"}],", and sharing an experimental version of the React Compiler to try out."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["For more information on using the Compiler and how it works, check out ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/react-compiler","children":"the docs"}]," and these talks:"]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=12020s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Forget About Memo"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/potetotes","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Lauren Tan"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=9313s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Compiler Deep Dive"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/_gsathya","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Sathya Gunasekaran"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/zmofei","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Mofei Zhang"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Watch the full day 1 keynote here:"}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/T8TZQ6k4SLE?t=973s"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"day-2","children":"Day 2 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","em",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=1720s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Watch the full day 2 stream here."}]}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["To kick off day 2, ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/sethwebster","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Seth Webster"}]," shared a welcome message, followed by a Thank You from ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://x.com/Eli_White","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Eli White"}]," and an introduction by our Chief Vibes Officer ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/_darkfadr","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ashley Narcisse"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["In the day 2 keynote, ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/cortinico","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Nicola Corti"}]," shared the State of React Native, including 78 million downloads in 2023. He also highlighted apps using React Native including 2000+ screens used inside of Meta; the product details page in Facebook Marketplace, which is visited more than 2 billion times per day; and part of the Microsoft Windows Start Menu and some features in almost every Microsoft Office product across mobile and desktop."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Nicola also highlighted all the work the community does to support React Native including libraries, frameworks, and multiple platforms. For more, check out these talks from the community:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=5798s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Extending React Native beyond Mobile and Desktop Apps"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/chris_trag","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Chris Traganos"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/anisha_malde","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Anisha Malde"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=22525s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Spatial computing with React"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/thymikee","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Michał Pierzchała"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/cipolleschir","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Riccardo Cipolleschi"}]," continued the day 2 keynote by announcing that the React Native New Architecture is now in Beta and ready for apps to adopt in production. He shared new features and improvements in the new architecture, and shared the roadmap for the future of React Native. For more check out:"]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=26569s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Cross Platform React"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/SlyCaptainFlint","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Olga Zinoveva"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/naman34","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Naman Goel"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Next in the keynote, Nicola announced that we are now recommending starting with a framework like Expo for all new apps created with React Native. With the change, he also announced a new React Native homepage and new Getting Started docs. You can view the new Getting Started guide in the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://reactnative.dev/docs/next/environment-setup","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Native docs"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Finally, to end the keynote, ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/kadikraman","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Kadi Kraman"}]," shared the latest features and improvements in Expo, and how to get started developing with React Native using Expo."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Watch the full day 2 keynote here:"}],"
",["$r","YouTubeIframe",null,{"src":"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0ckOUBiuxVY?t=1720s"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"q-and-a","children":"Q&A "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"The React and React Native teams also ended each day with a Q&A session:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=27518s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Q&A"}]," hosted by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/chantastic","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Michael Chan"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=27935s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Native Q&A"}]," hosted by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/jamonholmgren","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Jamon Holmgren"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"and-more","children":"And more… "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"We also heard talks on accessibility, error reporting, css, and more:"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=20655s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Demystifying accessibility in React apps"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/krambertech","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Kateryna Porshnieva"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=21696s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Pigment CSS, CSS in the server component age"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/olivtassinari","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Olivier Tassinari"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=24070s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Real-time React Server Components"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/threepointone","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Sunil Pai"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=25862s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Let’s break React Rules"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/c_isambert","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Charlotte Isambert"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=19881s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Solve 100% of your errors"}]," by ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/ryan953","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ryan Albrecht"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"thank-you","children":"Thank you "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Thank you to all the staff, speakers, and participants who made React Conf 2024 possible. There are too many to list, but we want to thank a few in particular."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Thank you to ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/barbara_markie","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Barbara Markiewicz"}],", the team at ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.callstack.com/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Callstack"}],", and our React Team Developer Advocate ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/mattcarrollcode","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Matt Carroll"}]," for helping to plan the entire event; and to ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://zeroslopeevents.com/about","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Sunny Leggett"}]," and everyone from ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://zeroslopeevents.com","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Zero Slope"}]," for helping to organize the event."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Thank you ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/_darkfadr","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ashley Narcisse"}]," for being our MC and Chief Vibes Officer; and to ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/chantastic","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Michael Chan"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/jamonholmgren","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Jamon Holmgren"}]," for hosting the Q&A sessions."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Thank you ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/sethwebster","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Seth Webster"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://x.com/Eli_White","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Eli White"}]," for welcoming us each day and providing direction on structure and content; and to ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/tomocchino","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Tom Occhino"}]," for joining us with a special message during the after-party."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Thank you ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FxTZL2U-uKg&t=1263s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ricky Hanlon"}]," for providing detailed feedback on talks, working on slide designs, and generally filling in the gaps to sweat the details."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Thank you ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.callstack.com/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Callstack"}]," for building the conference website; and to ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/kadikraman","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Kadi Kraman"}]," and the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://expo.dev/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Expo"}]," team for building the conference mobile app."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Thank you to all the sponsors who made the event possible: ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://remix.run/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Remix"}],", ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://developer.amazon.com/apps-and-games?cmp=US_2024_05_3P_React-Conf-2024&ch=prtnr&chlast=prtnr&pub=ref&publast=ref&type=org&typelast=org","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Amazon"}],", ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://mui.com/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"MUI"}],", ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://sentry.io/for/react/?utm_source=sponsored-conf&utm_medium=sponsored-event&utm_campaign=frontend-fy25q2-evergreen&utm_content=logo-reactconf2024-learnmore","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Sentry"}],", ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.jobs.abbott/software","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Abbott"}],", ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://expo.dev/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Expo"}],", ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://redwoodjs.com/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"RedwoodJS"}],", and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://vercel.com","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Vercel"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Thank you to the AV Team for the visuals, stage, and sound; and to the Westin Hotel for hosting us."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Thank you to all the speakers who shared their knowledge and experiences with the community."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Finally, thank you to everyone who attended in person and online to show what makes React, React. React is more than a library, it is a community, and it was inspiring to see everyone come together to share and learn together."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"See you next time!"}]]}]]

meta.title: React Conf 2024 Recap
meta.author: Ricky Hanlon
meta.description: Last week we hosted React Conf 2024, a two-day conference in Henderson, Nevada where 700+ attendees gathered in-person to discuss the latest in UI engineering. In this post, we'll summarize the talks and announcements from the event.
